attributes.action: Change how contribution based jobseekers are not entitle to as much money and support as income based job seekers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It should be that those who have worked all of their adult life then lose a job get the most support, not the benefit scroungers who never work. This needs to be changed. As a wife of a man who was made redundant at 27 from a large firm from him working from 16 it was so degrading for him, the government make it more difficult by advising him that if he does not find work within 6 months his benefit will still stop regardless, with the fear of us losing everything. This is not right when i know people even family members i am ashamed to say who have been on benefits since leaving school, a few small time jobs along the way, how is that fair?
